Train all aspects of your golf game through different challenges: from long distance driving to short distance pitching and chipping, from bunker exits to putting. By registering every ball in an easy and intuitive way, you will get to know your own game better and improve faster. 
Your training results are used to simulate how you would perform on an actual course through a Virtual Handicap, which you can compare with your actual handicap. Also get a useful overview of your chances to shoot a birdy, par or a (double) bogey. Moreover, the app will calculate your probabilities for a mishit or an unsuccessful bunker exit.

As COO, I was responsible for defining and implementing the company strategy, for both operations and  New Business Development.
